dcterms:description: The only dataset with two-hand mesh annotation, used for training networks focused on two-hand reconstruction, specifically utilizing interacting two-hand data with both human and machine annotations.
dcterms:title: InterHand2.6M

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of video sequences capturing different types of two-hand interactions, used for qualitative evaluation in the paper.
dcterms:title: RGB2Hands

dcterms:creator: Sven Bambach

dcterms:description: A dataset containing egocentric videos that capture complex interactions between two people, used for qualitative evaluation in the paper.
dcterms:title: EgoHands
